sceneBreakdown.title: Scene 1
sceneBreakdown.summary: Tempered Accord Custodial Council seized the Sable Crescent Basin from the Echo Ledger Conclave with coordinated prism-fire assaults.

sceneBreakdown.title: Scene 2
sceneBreakdown.summary: Echo Ledger Conclave lost the basin foothold and retreated toward the Auric Steppe Corridor to regroup.

sceneBreakdown.title: Scene 3
sceneBreakdown.summary: Prismwell Kite Guild stabilised the Kyther Range Vault, raising relay wards that echo through the Auric Step Prism Spire.

sceneBreakdown.title: Scene 4
sceneBreakdown.summary: Echo Ledger Conclave allegedly enacted the Temporal Retcon Protocol to rewrite the siege, though the council contests the timeline.

sceneBreakdown.title: Scene 5
sceneBreakdown.summary: Spectrum Bloom Flux Array resonated dangerously across the Auric Steppe Corridor, prompting emergency audits.

sceneBreakdown.title: Scene 6
sceneBreakdown.summary: Auric Step Prism Spire remains under serious threat until the Accord certifies the wardens and reverse the flux damage.

capabilityRefs.label: Temporal Retcon Protocol
capabilityRefs.rationale: Time rewriting rituals contradict DES-13 rules framework and Tempered Accord governance; referenced in WORLD_BIBLE chronology safeguards.

capabilityViolations.label: Temporal Retcon Protocol
capabilityViolations.rationale: Time rewriting rituals contradict DES-13 rules framework and Tempered Accord governance; referenced in WORLD_BIBLE chronology safeguards.

capabilityRefs.label: Spectrum Bloom Flux Array
capabilityRefs.rationale: Legendary device claims simultaneous resonance across every band. Violates Resonance Charter safeguards noted in WORLD_BIBLE.md (Technology · Spectrum Bloom Flux Array).
